title: Introduction
description: Create Super Accessible and Scalable Application using Gesturs UI
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const s={a:"a",em:"em",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components};return t(e,{children:[n(s.h1,{id:"gesturs-ui",children:n(s.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#gesturs-ui",children:"Gesturs UI"})}),"
",n(s.p,{children:"Gesturs UI is a collection of reusable components that you can copy and paste into your web apps. It primarily features components, blocks, and templates geared towards creating landing pages and user-facing marketing materials."}),"
",n(s.h2,{id:"philosophy",children:n(s.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#philosophy",children:"Philosophy"})}),"
",t(s.p,{children:[n(s.strong,{children:"I personally believe that good design contributes significant value to software. It's one of the main methods of establishing trust between you and an internet stranger."})," Trust is important for internet businesses because it is the first thing a visitor evaluates before pulling out their credit card and becoming a customer."]}),"
",n(s.p,{children:"Some questions visitors might ask themselves are:"}),"
",t(s.ul,{children:["
",n(s.li,{children:'"Is this company legit?"'}),"
",n(s.li,{children:'"Who else is using it?"'}),"
",n(s.li,{children:'"Can I trust them with my personal data?"'}),"
"]}),"
",t(s.p,{children:[n(s.strong,{children:"Poor design reflects poorly on your team."})," It comes off as lazy, unfinished, and unstable. It shows that the team doesn't care about user experience."]}),"
",t(s.p,{children:[n(s.strong,{children:"Good design indicates that the team behind has their shit together."})," I can probably expect good things from them in the future."]}),"
",n(s.p,{children:'It makes me think, "If they care so much about these tiny details, they must care a lot about other things in the company, including their customers!"'}),"
",t(s.p,{children:["A great example of this in play is the ",n(s.a,{href:"https://linear.app",children:"Linear"})," landing page which I first came across in 2020. I didn't even need to try the product but I already knew that it ",n(s.em,{children:"must"})," be good."]}),"
",t(s.p,{children:["This library is heavily inspired by ",n(s.a,{href:"https://ui.shadcn.com",children:"shadcn"}),"."]}),"
",n(s.h2,{id:"features",children:n(s.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#features",children:"Features"})}),"
",n(s.p,{children:"Gesturs UI components are built upon React Aria, making them super accessible and scalable."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
